ns8:component-version-script.description: Install MySQL service
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Tested on CentOS if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then # SELinux can be disabled by setting "/usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive" echo 'SELinux in enabled on this VM template. This service requires SELinux to be disabled to install successfully' exit 1 fi
if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ $OS = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Fix the linux-firmware package export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y linux-firmware < /dev/console > /dev/console # Install MySQL package apt-get install -y mysql-server else yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y install mysql-server fi

ns8:component-version-script.description: Configuring and Starting MySQL service
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Locate the my.cnf file my_cnf_file= if [ -f /etc/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/my.cnf elif [ -f /etc/mysql/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/mysql/my.cnf fi
if [ "x$my_cnf_file" = "x" ]; then echo "Neither /etc/my.cnf nor /etc/mysql/my.cnf can be found, stopping configuration" exit 1 fi
# update mysql configuration to handle big packets sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\ max_allowed_packet=1024M/g" $my_cnf_file # update listening port sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\ port=$db_port/g" $my_cnf_file
if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ $OS = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Make sure that MySQL is started service mysql restart else # set up auto-start on booting chkconfig mysqld on # restart mysqld service service mysqld start fi
# this will assign a password for mysql admin user 'root' mysqladmin -u $db_root_username password $db_root_password

ns8:component-version-script.description: UPDATE-lifecycle script for changing the MySQL properties
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # This is the UPDATE lifecycle script for MySql service to update db_port and/or db_root_password. # If other properties are changed, the script will need to be adjusted accordingly.
echo "MySQL server UPDATE to update db_port and db_root_password"
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Stop the script if unsupported properties updated declare -a unsupported_props for v in ${!APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}; do if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}" | grep -E "^(db_port|db_root_password)$"` == "" ]]; then unsupported_props+=(${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}) fi done if [ ${#unsupported_props[*]} -gt 0 ]; then echo This update script does not support the update of the following properties: ${unsupported_props[*]} exit 1; fi
# update root password if [[ "$APPD_PREV_db_root_password" != "" && "$APPD_PREV_db_root_password" != "$db_root_password" ]]; then echo "update root password" mysqladmin -u $db_root_username -p"$APPD_PREV_db_root_password" password "$db_root_password" fi
# Locate the my.cnf file my_cnf_file= if [ -f /etc/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/my.cnf elif [ -f /etc/mysql/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/mysql/my.cnf fi
if [ "x$my_cnf_file" = "x" ]; then echo "Neither /etc/my.cnf nor /etc/mysql/my.cnf can be found, stopping configuration" exit 1 fi
# Run this part of script if 'db_port' property changed. # The APPD_UPDATE_PROPS environment variable contains an array of changed and affected properties. if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'db_port'` != "" ]]; then echo "stop the mysql service before updating the port number" if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ "$OS" = 'Ubuntu' ]; then if [[ `service mysql status` == *running* ]]; then echo "stopping MySQL service..." service mysql stop fi else if [[ `service mysqld status` == *is\ running* ]]; then echo "stopping MySQL service..." service mysqld stop fi fi
echo "update listening port to $db_port" sed -ie "s/port=[0-9]*/port=$db_port/g" $my_cnf_file
# start the mysql service after updating the port number if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ "$OS" = 'Ubuntu' ]; then echo "Make sure that MySQL is started" service mysql start else service mysqld start fi fi
echo "Finished MySQL Server UPDATE"

ns8:component-version-script.description: Update provided sql script with MySQL
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Starting initialize-db-script:UPDATE to update db_username and/or db_password."
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
# Stop the script if unsupported properties updated declare -a unsupported_props for v in ${!APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}; do if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}" | grep -E "^(db_username|db_password|init_db_username|init_db_password)$"` == "" ]]; then unsupported_props+=(${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}) fi done if [ ${#unsupported_props[*]} -gt 0 ]; then echo This update script does not support the update of the following properties: ${unsupported_props[*]} exit 1; fi
# Run this part of script if 'db_username' property changed. # The APPD_UPDATE_PROPS environment variable contains an array of changed and affected properties. if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'db_username'` != "" ]]; then echo "Updating username to $db_username@localhost"
RENAME_USER_SCRIPT_FILE=rename_user_script_file.sql echo "rename user '$APPD_PREV_db_username'@'localhost' to '$db_username'@'localhost';" > $RENAME_USER_SCRIPT_FILE echo "rename user '$APPD_PREV_db_username' to '$db_username';" >> $RENAME_USER_SCRIPT_FILE mysql -u"$init_db_username" -p"$init_db_password" < $RENAME_USER_SCRIPT_FILE fi
# Run this part of script if 'db_password' property changed. if [[ "$APPD_PREV_db_password" != "" && "$APPD_PREV_db_password" != "$db_password" ]]; then echo "Updating db user password for $db_username@localhost"
UPDATE_PASSWORD_SCRIPT_FILE=update_password_script_file.sql echo "set password for '$db_username' = password('$db_password');" >> $UPDATE_PASSWORD_SCRIPT_FILE echo "Calling mysql with script $UPDATE_PASSWORD_SCRIPT_FILE "
mysql -u"$init_db_username" -p"$init_db_password" < $UPDATE_PASSWORD_SCRIPT_FILE fi echo "finished initialize-db-script:UPDATE"

service-version.description: Clusterable JBoss 5.1 on Linux JBoss Application Server is the open source implementation of the Java EE suite of services. It comprises a set of offerings for enterprise customers who are looking for preconfigured profiles of JBoss Enterprise Middleware components that have been tested and certified together to provide an integrated experience. It's easy-to-use server architecture and high flexibility makes JBoss the ideal choice for users just starting out with J2EE, as well as senior architects looking for a customizable middleware platform.

ns8:component-version-script.description: JBoss configure yum repo, also update all packages, install jBoss server
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
#Setup JBoss
cd /tmp mv $cheetah_tgz_url . filename=`basename $cheetah_tgz_url` CHEETAH_TGZ_PATH=/tmp/$filename mv $zip_url . filename=`basename $zip_url` JBOSS_ZIP_PATH=/tmp/$filename echo "PATH: $PATH" > properties.txt echo "cheetah_install_script: $cheetah_install_script " >> properties.txt echo "jboss_install_script: $jboss_install_script" >> properties.txt echo "CHEETAH_TGZ_PATH: $CHEETAH_TGZ_PATH" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_ZIP_PATH: $JBOSS_ZIP_PATH" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION: $JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME: $JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_JMX_USER: $JBOSS_JMX_USER" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_JMX_PWD: $JBOSS_JMX_PWD" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_BOOTRC_TEMPLATE: $JBOSS_BOOTRC_TEMPLATE" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_JMX_CONSOLE_USERS_TEMPLATE: $JBOSS_JMX_CONSOLE_USERS_TEMPLATE" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_PEER_NAME: $JBOSS_PEER_NAME" >> properties.txt . $cheetah_install_script &>1 2>&1 | tee /tmp/cheetah_output . $jboss_install_script

ns8:component-version-script.description: UPDATE-lifecycle script for JBoss app server
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # This is the UPDATE lifecycle script for JBoss service to update JBOSS_JMX_USER and JBOSS_JMX_PWD. # If other properties are changed, the script will need to be adjusted accordingly.
echo "JBoss server UPDATE."
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
[ -z "$JBOSS_JMX_USER" ] && echo "Need to set JBOSS_JMX_USER" && exit 1 [ -z "$JBOSS_JMX_PWD" ] && echo "Need to set JBOSS_JMX_PWD" && exit 1
# Stop the script if unsupported properties updated declare -a unsupported_props for v in ${!APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}; do if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}" | grep -E "^(JBOSS_JMX_USER|JBOSS_JMX_PWD)$"` == "" ]]; then unsupported_props+=(${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}) fi done if [ ${#unsupported_props[*]} -gt 0 ]; then echo This update script does not support the update of the following properties: ${unsupported_props[*]} exit 1; fi
echo "Stop JBoss service" service jboss stop sleep 60
HOME_DIR=/home/jboss export JBOSS_USER=jboss export JBOSS_HOME=$HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as BOOTRC=/etc/init.d/jboss
echo "Re-generate JBoss booting script..." cheetah fill -p --env $JBOSS_BOOTRC_TEMPLATE > $BOOTRC
echo "Update jmx console users..." JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR=$JBOSS_HOME/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME
cd $JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR/conf/props cheetah fill -p --env $JBOSS_JMX_CONSOLE_USERS_TEMPLATE > jmx-console-users.properties
echo "Starting JBoss service again..." service jboss start
echo "Finished JBoss Server UPDATE"

ns8:component-version-script.description: Update Dukes_Bank_App component for EAR/JAR files and db_password changes
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Starting DukesBankApp:UPDATE for EAR_FILE and JAR_FILE and db_port, db_password, and/or db_user property change."
PATH=$PATH:/sbin:/usr/sbin export JBOSS_DS_CONNECTION_URL="jdbc:mysql://$db_host:$db_port/dukes_db"
HOME_DIR=/home/jboss
# Stop the script if unsupported properties updated declare -a unsupported_props for v in ${!APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}; do if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}" | grep -E "^(EAR_FILE|JAR_FILE|db_port|db_password|db_user)$"` == "" ]]; then unsupported_props+=(${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}) fi done if [ ${#unsupported_props[*]} -gt 0 ]; then echo This update script does not support the update of the following properties: ${unsupported_props[*]} exit 1; fi
#overidable default vars export JBOSS_DS_USER_NAME="$db_user" export JBOSS_DS_USER_PWD="$db_password" export JBOSS_DS_JNDI_NAME="dukesBankDS" export JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION="jboss-5.1.0.GA" export JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME="default" export JBOSS_DS_DRIVER_CLASS="com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"
echo "Stopping jboss service" service jboss stop sleep 60
echo "Reconfiguring datasource with changed db_user and db_password property" . $jboss_deploy_datasource_script 2>&1 > /tmp/jboss_change_datasource.log echo "Finished script $jboss_deploy_datasource_script "
EAR_ORIG=`cd /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/deploy; ls` JAR_ORIG=`cd /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/lib; ls`
if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'EAR_FILE'` != "" ]]; then echo "Removing original DukesBank ear file" rm -rf $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/deploy/${EAR_ORIG} if [ -e $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/deploy/${EAR_ORIG} ]; then echo "File: $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/deploy/${EAR_ORIG} cannot be deleted" exit 1 else echo "Removed original DukesBank ear file: $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/deploy/${EAR_ORIG}" fi fi
if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'JAR_FILE'` != "" ]]; then echo "Removing original DukesBank jar file" rm -rf $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/lib/${JAR_ORIG} if [ -e $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/lib/${JAR_ORIG} ]; then echo "File: $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/lib/${JAR_ORIG} cannot be deleted" exit 1 else echo "Removed original DukesBank jar file: $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/lib/${JAR_ORIG}" fi fi
if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'EAR_FILE'` != "" ]]; then echo "Reinstalling DukesBank ear file from configuration-change location" JBOSS_COMPONENT_FILE=$EAR_FILE . $jboss_deploy_component_script &> /tmp/jboss_deploy_ear.log fi if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'JAR_FILE'` != "" ]]; then echo "Reinstalling DukesBank jar file from configuration-change location" JBOSS_COMPONENT_FILE=$JAR_FILE . $jboss_deploy_component_script &> /tmp/jboss_deploy_jar.log fi
if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'EAR_FILE'` != "" ]]; then echo "back up the new jboss ear component file" BASE_EAR_FILE=`basename ${EAR_FILE}` rm -rf /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/deploy/${EAR_ORIG} touch /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/deploy/${BASE_EAR_FILE} fi if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'JAR_FILE'` != "" ]]; then echo "back up the new jboss jar component file" BASE_JAR_FILE=`basename ${JAR_FILE}` rm -rf /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/lib/${JAR_ORIG} touch /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/lib/${BASE_JAR_FILE} fi
echo "Restarting jboss service" service jboss start
echo "Finished DukesBankApp:UPDATE"

ns8:component-version-script.description: Start jBoss server
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash PATH=$PATH:/sbin:/usr/sbin export JBOSS_DS_CONNECTION_URL="jdbc:mysql://$db_host:$db_port/dukes_db"
service jboss stop
#overidable default vars if [ -z "$JBOSS_DS_USER_NAME" ]; then export JBOSS_DS_USER_NAME="$db_user" fi
if [ -z "$JBOSS_DS_USER_PWD" ]; then export JBOSS_DS_USER_PWD="$db_password" fi
if [ -z "$JBOSS_DS_JNDI_NAME" ]; then export JBOSS_DS_JNDI_NAME="dukesBankDS" fi
if [ -z "$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION" ]; then export JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION="jboss-5.1.0.GA" fi
if [ -z "$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME" ]; then export JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME="default" fi
if [ -z "$JBOSS_DS_DRIVER_CLASS" ]; then export JBOSS_DS_DRIVER_CLASS="com.mysql.jdbc.Driver" fi
. $jboss_deploy_datasource_script &> /tmp/jboss_deploy_ds.log export JBOSS_COMPONENT_FILE=$EAR_FILE echo "reinstall ${JBOSS_COMPONENT_FILE} file" . $jboss_deploy_component_script &> /tmp/jboss_deploy_ear.log export JBOSS_COMPONENT_FILE=$JAR_FILE echo "reinstall ${JBOSS_COMPONENT_FILE} file" . $jboss_deploy_component_script &> /tmp/jboss_deploy_jar.log
echo "back up the jboss component files" mkdir -p /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/deploy mkdir -p /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/lib BASE_EAR_FILE=`basename ${EAR_FILE}` BASE_JAR_FILE=`basename ${JAR_FILE}` touch /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/deploy/${BASE_EAR_FILE} touch /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/lib/${BASE_JAR_FILE}
service jboss start

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/sh -p
#set -x
#parameters: #adc_ip_address management IP address of the ADC #adc_snmp_read SNMP read community public secured #adc_snmp_write SNMP write community private secured #adc_cli_user CLI user name admin secured #adc_cli_password CLI password admin secured #vdirect_va_address_2 IP address from 2nd ethernet card to be used as VIP #vip_port TCP port to be used for incoming traffic 80 #real_port TCP port connected at the back end servers 80 #application possible values: none,http,https,ssl,dns,rtsp,wts,basic-slb http #protocol possible values: none,tcp,udp,stateless none #session_persistence possible values: none,yes none #metric possible values: leastconns,svcleast,roundrobin,minmisses,hash,response,bandwidth,phash roundrobin #health_monitor possible values: arp,icmp,tcp,dns,udpdns,http,httphead,pop3,smtp,ftp,imap,sslh,sslhv3 tcp #health_monitor_content possible values: none, URI none #server_ips ip addresses of the back end servers
#constants: #container_name #adc_name #configure_service_template #add_servers_to_service_template
# Import Global conf #. $global_conf
set -x
container_name="adcc" adc_name="adc" configure_service_template="l4.vm" add_servers_to_service_template="add-rips-to-vis.vm"
#calculated: #vip_address - this is calculated
echo "local params:" echo "container_name $container_name" echo "adc_name $adc_name" echo "configure_service_template $configure_service_template" echo "add_servers_to_service_template $add_servers_to_service_template"
function validate_env_params(){ local params=("$@") local has_errors=0 for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#params[@]} ; i++ )); do local pname=${params[$i]} local pval=${!pname} if [ -z $pval ] then echo "ERROR: $pname is empty!" has_errors=1 # else # echo "$pname is defined" # echo "$pname=$pval" fi done if [ $has_errors -eq 1 ] then exit 1 fi }
function create_temp_file(){ local TMPFILE=`mktemp /tmp/$1.XXXXXXXXXX` if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "ERROR: failed to create temporary $1 file!!" exit 1 fi #echo "created $TMPFILE file" echo $TMPFILE }
function wait_for_vdirect_ws(){ echo "waiting for web services to start" /usr/bin/wget -t 30 --retry-connrefused -O /dev/null http://127.0.0.1:2188/management-server/services if [ $? -eq 0 ] then echo "hopefully web service have started" else echo "ERROR: web service is not started!!" exit 1 fi }
function check_if_container_name_exists(){ local container_name=$1
local TMPCONTLISTINP=$(create_temp_file "cont_list.inp") local TMPCONTLISTOUT=$(create_temp_file "cont_list.out")
echo "checking if $container_name already exists" echo /container/list > $TMPCONTLISTINP echo exit >> $TMPCONTLISTINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPCONTLISTINP > $TMPCONTLISTOUT
if grep $container_name $TMPCONTLISTOUT then echo "ERROR: container $container_name exists!!" #rm -f $TMPCONTLISTINP #rm -f $TMPCONTLISTOUT exit 1 fi
#rm -f $TMPCONTLISTINP #rm -f $TMPCONTLISTOUT }
function register_container(){ local container_name=$1 local adc_name=$2 local adc_ip_address=$3 local adc_snmp_read=$4 local adc_snmp_write=$5 local adc_cli_user=$6 local adc_cli_password=$7
local TMPCONTREGINP=$(create_temp_file "cont_reg.inp") local TMPCONTREGOUT=$(create_temp_file "cont_reg.out")
echo "trying to register $container_name" sleep 1
echo /container/register/dedicated $container_name > $TMPCONTREGINP echo ip $adc_ip_address >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo read $adc_snmp_read >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo write $adc_snmp_write >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo cliuser $adc_cli_user >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo clipassword $adc_cli_password >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo submit >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo connect $container_name >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo register >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo $adc_name >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo exit >> $TMPCONTREGINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPCONTREGINP > $TMPCONTREGOUT
if grep FAILED $TMPCONTREGOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to register container $container_name!! retrying" sleep 1 /opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPCONTREGINP > $TMPCONTREGOUT if grep FAILED $TMPCONTREGOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to register container $container_name for the 2nd time!!" #rm -f $TMPCONTREGINP #rm -f $TMPCONTREGOUT exit 1 fi fi
#rm -f $TMPCONTREGINP #rm -f $TMPCONTREGOUT
echo "sucessfuly registered $container_name" }
# this function will setup a global variable called vip_address function disable_2nd_ethernet(){ local vdirect_va_address_2=$1
echo "disabling the ethernet card allocated with the vip address $vdirect_va_address_2 as long as it is not eth0" local tmp_card_name=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep -B 1 "addr:$vdirect_va_address_2 " | /bin/grep -o eth[0-9]*` if [ -n "$tmp_card_name" ] then local mask_expression=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep "addr:$vdirect_va_address_2 " | /bin/grep -o Bcast:.*Mask` local card_ammount=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep -c "$mask_expression"` if [ $tmp_card_name == "eth0" ] then if [ $card_ammount -lt 2 ] then echo "ERROR: vip is mapped to eth0, than should be at least two cards on the same network!!" exit 1 fi echo "The IP is mapped to eth0 looking for another card" local tmp_card_name2=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep -B 1 "$mask_expression" | /bin/grep -o eth[0-9] | /bin/grep -v $tmp_card_name | /usr/bin/tail -1` echo "The possible other card is $tmp_card_name2" if [ -n "$tmp_card_name2" ] then local card_name=$tmp_card_name2 vip_address=`/sbin/ifconfig $card_name | /bin/grep 'inet addr:' | /bin/cut -d: -f2 | /bin/awk '{ print $1}'` if [ -z "$vip_address" ] then echo "ERROR: could not find the ip adress of $tmp_card_name2!!!" exit 1 fi else echo "ERROR: could not find a 2nd card which is not eth0!!!" exit 1 fi else local card_name=$tmp_card_name vip_address=$vdirect_va_address_2 fi
echo "disabling card $card_name and $vip_address originaly intended for card $tmp_card_name and $vdirect_va_address_2" /sbin/ifdown $card_name /bin/cp -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name.vdir.bak /bin/sed "s/ONBOOT=yes/ONBOOT=no/" /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name > /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name.vdir.new /bin/cp -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name.vdir.new /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name else echo "The vdirect_va_address_2 $vdirect_va_address_2 is not mapped to any exsiting network card, using as vip address" vip_address=$vdirect_va_address_2 fi ##vip_address should be set and used by the rest of the script }
function check_if_template_exists() { local adc_configuration_template_name=$1
local TMPTEMPLISTINP=$(create_temp_file "templ_list.inp") local TMPTEMPLISTOUT=$(create_temp_file "templ_list.out")
echo "checking if $adc_configuration_template_name exists"
echo /template/list > $TMPTEMPLISTINP echo exit >> $TMPTEMPLISTINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPTEMPLISTINP > $TMPTEMPLISTOUT
if ! grep $adc_configuration_template_name $TMPTEMPLISTOUT then echo "ERROR: container $adc_configuration_template_name does not exists!!" rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTINP rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTOUT exit 1 fi rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTINP rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTOUT }
function run_template() { local adc_name=$1 local adc_configuration_template_name=$2
local TMPADCCONFINP=$(create_temp_file "adc_conf.inp") local TMPADCCONFOUT=$(create_temp_file "adc_conf.out")
echo "trying to run on adc $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name" sleep 1
echo /template/connect $adc_name > $TMPADCCONFINP echo run $adc_configuration_template_name >> $TMPADCCONFINP for (( i = 3 ; i <= $# ; i++ )); do echo ${!i} >> $TMPADCCONFINP done echo apply >> $TMPADCCONFINP echo save >> $TMPADCCONFINP echo exit >> $TMPADCCONFINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPADCCONFINP > $TMPADCCONFOUT if grep FAILED $TMPADCCONFOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to run on $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name with parameters $@!! trying again." sleep 1 /opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPADCCONFINP > $TMPADCCONFOUT if grep FAILED $TMPADCCONFOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to 2nd try to run on $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name with parameters $@!!" rm -f $TMPADCCONFINP rm -f $TMPADCCONFOUT exit 1 fi fi
rm -f $TMPADCCONFINP rm -f $TMPADCCONFOUT
echo "sucessfuly run on adc $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name" }
#star the actual script
declare -a env_params=(adc_ip_address adc_snmp_read adc_snmp_write adc_cli_user adc_cli_password vdirect_va_address_2 vip_port real_port application protocol session_persistence metric health_monitor health_monitor_content server_ips) echo "expected parameters=${env_params[@]}" validate_env_params "${env_params[@]}"
wait_for_vdirect_ws
check_if_container_name_exists $container_name register_container $container_name $adc_name $adc_ip_address $adc_snmp_read $adc_snmp_write $adc_cli_user $adc_cli_password
disable_2nd_ethernet $vdirect_va_address_2
check_if_template_exists $configure_service_template run_template $adc_name $configure_service_template $vdirect_va_address_2 $vip_address $vip_port $real_port $application $protocol $session_persistence $metric $health_monitor $health_monitor_content
check_if_template_exists $add_servers_to_service_template
#the followin lines will either accept an array or a space delimited string and will transform it to a comma delimited string srv_string="${server_ips[*]}" srv_space=" " srv_comma="," SRVSTR=${srv_string//$srv_space/$srv_comma}
run_template $adc_name $add_servers_to_service_template $vdirect_va_address_2 $SRVSTR
exit 0

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/sh -p
#set -x
#parameters: #adc_ip_address management IP address of the ADC #adc_snmp_read SNMP read community public secured #adc_snmp_write SNMP write community private secured #adc_cli_user CLI user name admin secured #adc_cli_password CLI password admin secured #vdirect_va_address_2 IP address from 2nd ethernet card to be used as VIP #vip_port TCP port to be used for incoming traffic 80 #real_port TCP port connected at the back end servers 80 #application possible values: none,http,https,ssl,dns,rtsp,wts,basic-slb http #protocol possible values: none,tcp,udp,stateless none #session_persistence possible values: none,yes none #metric possible values: leastconns,svcleast,roundrobin,minmisses,hash,response,bandwidth,phash roundrobin #health_monitor possible values: arp,icmp,tcp,dns,udpdns,http,httphead,pop3,smtp,ftp,imap,sslh,sslhv3 tcp #health_monitor_content possible values: none, URI none #server_ips ip addresses of the back end servers
#constants: #container_name #adc_name #configure_service_template #add_servers_to_service_template
# Import Global conf #. $global_conf
set -x
container_name="adcc" adc_name="adc" configure_service_template="l4.vm" add_servers_to_service_template="add-rips-to-vis.vm"
#calculated: #vip_address - this is calculated
echo "local params:" echo "container_name $container_name" echo "adc_name $adc_name" echo "configure_service_template $configure_service_template" echo "add_servers_to_service_template $add_servers_to_service_template"
function validate_env_params(){ local params=("$@") local has_errors=0 for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#params[@]} ; i++ )); do local pname=${params[$i]} local pval=${!pname} if [ -z $pval ] then echo "ERROR: $pname is empty!" has_errors=1 # else # echo "$pname is defined" # echo "$pname=$pval" fi done if [ $has_errors -eq 1 ] then exit 1 fi }
function create_temp_file(){ local TMPFILE=`mktemp /tmp/$1.XXXXXXXXXX` if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "ERROR: failed to create temporary $1 file!!" exit 1 fi #echo "created $TMPFILE file" echo $TMPFILE }
function wait_for_vdirect_ws(){ echo "waiting for web services to start" /usr/bin/wget -t 30 --retry-connrefused -O /dev/null http://127.0.0.1:2188/management-server/services if [ $? -eq 0 ] then echo "hopefully web service have started" else echo "ERROR: web service is not started!!" exit 1 fi }
function check_if_container_name_exists(){ local container_name=$1
local TMPCONTLISTINP=$(create_temp_file "cont_list.inp") local TMPCONTLISTOUT=$(create_temp_file "cont_list.out")
echo "checking if $container_name already exists" echo /container/list > $TMPCONTLISTINP echo exit >> $TMPCONTLISTINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPCONTLISTINP > $TMPCONTLISTOUT
if grep $container_name $TMPCONTLISTOUT then echo "ERROR: container $container_name exists!!" #rm -f $TMPCONTLISTINP #rm -f $TMPCONTLISTOUT exit 1 fi
#rm -f $TMPCONTLISTINP #rm -f $TMPCONTLISTOUT }
function register_container(){ local container_name=$1 local adc_name=$2 local adc_ip_address=$3 local adc_snmp_read=$4 local adc_snmp_write=$5 local adc_cli_user=$6 local adc_cli_password=$7
local TMPCONTREGINP=$(create_temp_file "cont_reg.inp") local TMPCONTREGOUT=$(create_temp_file "cont_reg.out")
echo "trying to register $container_name" sleep 1
echo /container/register/dedicated $container_name > $TMPCONTREGINP echo ip $adc_ip_address >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo read $adc_snmp_read >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo write $adc_snmp_write >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo cliuser $adc_cli_user >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo clipassword $adc_cli_password >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo submit >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo connect $container_name >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo register >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo $adc_name >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo exit >> $TMPCONTREGINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPCONTREGINP > $TMPCONTREGOUT
if grep FAILED $TMPCONTREGOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to register container $container_name!! retrying" sleep 1 /opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPCONTREGINP > $TMPCONTREGOUT if grep FAILED $TMPCONTREGOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to register container $container_name for the 2nd time!!" #rm -f $TMPCONTREGINP #rm -f $TMPCONTREGOUT exit 1 fi fi
#rm -f $TMPCONTREGINP #rm -f $TMPCONTREGOUT
echo "sucessfuly registered $container_name" }
# this function will setup a global variable called vip_address function disable_2nd_ethernet(){ local vdirect_va_address_2=$1
echo "disabling the ethernet card allocated with the vip address $vdirect_va_address_2 as long as it is not eth0" local tmp_card_name=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep -B 1 "addr:$vdirect_va_address_2 " | /bin/grep -o eth[0-9]*` if [ -n "$tmp_card_name" ] then local mask_expression=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep "addr:$vdirect_va_address_2 " | /bin/grep -o Bcast:.*Mask` local card_ammount=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep -c "$mask_expression"` if [ $tmp_card_name == "eth0" ] then if [ $card_ammount -lt 2 ] then echo "ERROR: vip is mapped to eth0, than should be at least two cards on the same network!!" exit 1 fi echo "The IP is mapped to eth0 looking for another card" local tmp_card_name2=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep -B 1 "$mask_expression" | /bin/grep -o eth[0-9] | /bin/grep -v $tmp_card_name | /usr/bin/tail -1` echo "The possible other card is $tmp_card_name2" if [ -n "$tmp_card_name2" ] then local card_name=$tmp_card_name2 vip_address=`/sbin/ifconfig $card_name | /bin/grep 'inet addr:' | /bin/cut -d: -f2 | /bin/awk '{ print $1}'` if [ -z "$vip_address" ] then echo "ERROR: could not find the ip adress of $tmp_card_name2!!!" exit 1 fi else echo "ERROR: could not find a 2nd card which is not eth0!!!" exit 1 fi else local card_name=$tmp_card_name vip_address=$vdirect_va_address_2 fi
echo "disabling card $card_name and $vip_address originaly intended for card $tmp_card_name and $vdirect_va_address_2" /sbin/ifdown $card_name /bin/cp -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name.vdir.bak /bin/sed "s/ONBOOT=yes/ONBOOT=no/" /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name > /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name.vdir.new /bin/cp -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name.vdir.new /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name else echo "The vdirect_va_address_2 $vdirect_va_address_2 is not mapped to any exsiting network card, using as vip address" vip_address=$vdirect_va_address_2 fi ##vip_address should be set and used by the rest of the script }
function check_if_template_exists() { local adc_configuration_template_name=$1
local TMPTEMPLISTINP=$(create_temp_file "templ_list.inp") local TMPTEMPLISTOUT=$(create_temp_file "templ_list.out")
echo "checking if $adc_configuration_template_name exists"
echo /template/list > $TMPTEMPLISTINP echo exit >> $TMPTEMPLISTINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPTEMPLISTINP > $TMPTEMPLISTOUT
if ! grep $adc_configuration_template_name $TMPTEMPLISTOUT then echo "ERROR: container $adc_configuration_template_name does not exists!!" rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTINP rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTOUT exit 1 fi rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTINP rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTOUT }
function run_template() { local adc_name=$1 local adc_configuration_template_name=$2
local TMPADCCONFINP=$(create_temp_file "adc_conf.inp") local TMPADCCONFOUT=$(create_temp_file "adc_conf.out")
echo "trying to run on adc $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name" sleep 1
echo /template/connect $adc_name > $TMPADCCONFINP echo run $adc_configuration_template_name >> $TMPADCCONFINP for (( i = 3 ; i <= $# ; i++ )); do echo ${!i} >> $TMPADCCONFINP done echo apply >> $TMPADCCONFINP echo save >> $TMPADCCONFINP echo exit >> $TMPADCCONFINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPADCCONFINP > $TMPADCCONFOUT if grep FAILED $TMPADCCONFOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to run on $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name with parameters $@!! trying again." sleep 1 /opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPADCCONFINP > $TMPADCCONFOUT if grep FAILED $TMPADCCONFOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to 2nd try to run on $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name with parameters $@!!" rm -f $TMPADCCONFINP rm -f $TMPADCCONFOUT exit 1 fi fi
rm -f $TMPADCCONFINP rm -f $TMPADCCONFOUT
echo "sucessfuly run on adc $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name" }
#star the actual script
declare -a env_params=(adc_ip_address adc_snmp_read adc_snmp_write adc_cli_user adc_cli_password vdirect_va_address_2 vip_port real_port application protocol session_persistence metric health_monitor health_monitor_content server_ips) echo "expected parameters=${env_params[@]}" validate_env_params "${env_params[@]}"
wait_for_vdirect_ws
check_if_container_name_exists $container_name register_container $container_name $adc_name $adc_ip_address $adc_snmp_read $adc_snmp_write $adc_cli_user $adc_cli_password
disable_2nd_ethernet $vdirect_va_address_2
check_if_template_exists $configure_service_template run_template $adc_name $configure_service_template $vdirect_va_address_2 $vip_address $vip_port $real_port $application $protocol $session_persistence $metric $health_monitor $health_monitor_content
check_if_template_exists $add_servers_to_service_template
#the followin lines will either accept an array or a space delimited string and will transform it to a comma delimited string srv_string="${server_ips[*]}" srv_space=" " srv_comma="," SRVSTR=${srv_string//$srv_space/$srv_comma}
run_template $adc_name $add_servers_to_service_template $vdirect_va_address_2 $SRVSTR
exit 0

ns8:component-version-script.description: Install MySQL service
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Tested on CentOS if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then # SELinux can be disabled by setting "/usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive" echo 'SELinux in enabled on this VM template. This service requires SELinux to be disabled to install successfully' exit 1 fi
if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ $OS = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Fix the linux-firmware package export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y linux-firmware < /dev/console > /dev/console # Install MySQL package apt-get install -y mysql-server else yum --nogpgcheck --noplugins -y install mysql-server fi

ns8:component-version-script.description: Configuring and Starting MySQL service
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Locate the my.cnf file my_cnf_file= if [ -f /etc/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/my.cnf elif [ -f /etc/mysql/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/mysql/my.cnf fi
if [ "x$my_cnf_file" = "x" ]; then echo "Neither /etc/my.cnf nor /etc/mysql/my.cnf can be found, stopping configuration" exit 1 fi
# update mysql configuration to handle big packets sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\ max_allowed_packet=1024M/g" $my_cnf_file # update listening port sed -ie "s/\[mysqld\]/\[mysqld\]\n\ port=$db_port/g" $my_cnf_file
if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ $OS = 'Ubuntu' ]; then # Make sure that MySQL is started service mysql restart else # set up auto-start on booting chkconfig mysqld on # restart mysqld service service mysqld start fi
# this will assign a password for mysql admin user 'root' mysqladmin -u $db_root_username password $db_root_password

ns8:component-version-script.description: UPDATE-lifecycle script for changing the MySQL properties
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # This is the UPDATE lifecycle script for MySql service to update db_port and/or db_root_password. # If other properties are changed, the script will need to be adjusted accordingly.
echo "MySQL server UPDATE to update db_port and db_root_password"
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Stop the script if unsupported properties updated declare -a unsupported_props for v in ${!APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}; do if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}" | grep -E "^(db_port|db_root_password)$"` == "" ]]; then unsupported_props+=(${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}) fi done if [ ${#unsupported_props[*]} -gt 0 ]; then echo This update script does not support the update of the following properties: ${unsupported_props[*]} exit 1; fi
# update root password if [[ "$APPD_PREV_db_root_password" != "" && "$APPD_PREV_db_root_password" != "$db_root_password" ]]; then echo "update root password" mysqladmin -u $db_root_username -p"$APPD_PREV_db_root_password" password "$db_root_password" fi
# Locate the my.cnf file my_cnf_file= if [ -f /etc/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/my.cnf elif [ -f /etc/mysql/my.cnf ]; then my_cnf_file=/etc/mysql/my.cnf fi
if [ "x$my_cnf_file" = "x" ]; then echo "Neither /etc/my.cnf nor /etc/mysql/my.cnf can be found, stopping configuration" exit 1 fi
# Run this part of script if 'db_port' property changed. # The APPD_UPDATE_PROPS environment variable contains an array of changed and affected properties. if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'db_port'` != "" ]]; then echo "stop the mysql service before updating the port number" if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ "$OS" = 'Ubuntu' ]; then if [[ `service mysql status` == *running* ]]; then echo "stopping MySQL service..." service mysql stop fi else if [[ `service mysqld status` == *is\ running* ]]; then echo "stopping MySQL service..." service mysqld stop fi fi
echo "update listening port to $db_port" sed -ie "s/port=[0-9]*/port=$db_port/g" $my_cnf_file
# start the mysql service after updating the port number if [ "x$OS" != "x" ] && [ "$OS" = 'Ubuntu' ]; then echo "Make sure that MySQL is started" service mysql start else service mysqld start fi fi
echo "Finished MySQL Server UPDATE"

ns8:component-version-script.description: Update provided sql script with MySQL
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Starting initialize-db-script:UPDATE to update db_username and/or db_password."
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
# Stop the script if unsupported properties updated declare -a unsupported_props for v in ${!APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}; do if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}" | grep -E "^(db_username|db_password|init_db_username|init_db_password)$"` == "" ]]; then unsupported_props+=(${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}) fi done if [ ${#unsupported_props[*]} -gt 0 ]; then echo This update script does not support the update of the following properties: ${unsupported_props[*]} exit 1; fi
# Run this part of script if 'db_username' property changed. # The APPD_UPDATE_PROPS environment variable contains an array of changed and affected properties. if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'db_username'` != "" ]]; then echo "Updating username to $db_username@localhost"
RENAME_USER_SCRIPT_FILE=rename_user_script_file.sql echo "rename user '$APPD_PREV_db_username'@'localhost' to '$db_username'@'localhost';" > $RENAME_USER_SCRIPT_FILE echo "rename user '$APPD_PREV_db_username' to '$db_username';" >> $RENAME_USER_SCRIPT_FILE mysql -u"$init_db_username" -p"$init_db_password" < $RENAME_USER_SCRIPT_FILE fi
# Run this part of script if 'db_password' property changed. if [[ "$APPD_PREV_db_password" != "" && "$APPD_PREV_db_password" != "$db_password" ]]; then echo "Updating db user password for $db_username@localhost"
UPDATE_PASSWORD_SCRIPT_FILE=update_password_script_file.sql echo "set password for '$db_username' = password('$db_password');" >> $UPDATE_PASSWORD_SCRIPT_FILE echo "Calling mysql with script $UPDATE_PASSWORD_SCRIPT_FILE "
mysql -u"$init_db_username" -p"$init_db_password" < $UPDATE_PASSWORD_SCRIPT_FILE fi echo "finished initialize-db-script:UPDATE"

ns8:component-version-script.description: JBoss configure yum repo, also update all packages, install jBoss server
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
#Setup JBoss
cd /tmp mv $cheetah_tgz_url . filename=`basename $cheetah_tgz_url` CHEETAH_TGZ_PATH=/tmp/$filename mv $zip_url . filename=`basename $zip_url` JBOSS_ZIP_PATH=/tmp/$filename echo "PATH: $PATH" > properties.txt echo "cheetah_install_script: $cheetah_install_script " >> properties.txt echo "jboss_install_script: $jboss_install_script" >> properties.txt echo "CHEETAH_TGZ_PATH: $CHEETAH_TGZ_PATH" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_ZIP_PATH: $JBOSS_ZIP_PATH" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION: $JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME: $JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_JMX_USER: $JBOSS_JMX_USER" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_JMX_PWD: $JBOSS_JMX_PWD" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_BOOTRC_TEMPLATE: $JBOSS_BOOTRC_TEMPLATE" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_JMX_CONSOLE_USERS_TEMPLATE: $JBOSS_JMX_CONSOLE_USERS_TEMPLATE" >> properties.txt echo "JBOSS_PEER_NAME: $JBOSS_PEER_NAME" >> properties.txt . $cheetah_install_script &>1 2>&1 | tee /tmp/cheetah_output . $jboss_install_script

ns8:component-version-script.description: UPDATE-lifecycle script for JBoss app server
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # This is the UPDATE lifecycle script for JBoss service to update JBOSS_JMX_USER and JBOSS_JMX_PWD. # If other properties are changed, the script will need to be adjusted accordingly.
echo "JBoss server UPDATE."
# Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
[ -z "$JBOSS_JMX_USER" ] && echo "Need to set JBOSS_JMX_USER" && exit 1 [ -z "$JBOSS_JMX_PWD" ] && echo "Need to set JBOSS_JMX_PWD" && exit 1
# Stop the script if unsupported properties updated declare -a unsupported_props for v in ${!APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}; do if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}" | grep -E "^(JBOSS_JMX_USER|JBOSS_JMX_PWD)$"` == "" ]]; then unsupported_props+=(${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}) fi done if [ ${#unsupported_props[*]} -gt 0 ]; then echo This update script does not support the update of the following properties: ${unsupported_props[*]} exit 1; fi
echo "Stop JBoss service" service jboss stop sleep 60
HOME_DIR=/home/jboss export JBOSS_USER=jboss export JBOSS_HOME=$HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as BOOTRC=/etc/init.d/jboss
echo "Re-generate JBoss booting script..." cheetah fill -p --env $JBOSS_BOOTRC_TEMPLATE > $BOOTRC
echo "Update jmx console users..." JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR=$JBOSS_HOME/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME
cd $JBOSS_INSTANCE_DIR/conf/props cheetah fill -p --env $JBOSS_JMX_CONSOLE_USERS_TEMPLATE > jmx-console-users.properties
echo "Starting JBoss service again..." service jboss start
echo "Finished JBoss Server UPDATE"

ns8:component-version-script.description: Update Dukes_Bank_App component for EAR/JAR files and db_password changes
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Starting DukesBankApp:UPDATE for EAR_FILE and JAR_FILE and db_port, db_password, and/or db_user property change."
PATH=$PATH:/sbin:/usr/sbin export JBOSS_DS_CONNECTION_URL="jdbc:mysql://$db_host:$db_port/dukes_db"
HOME_DIR=/home/jboss
# Stop the script if unsupported properties updated declare -a unsupported_props for v in ${!APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}; do if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}" | grep -E "^(EAR_FILE|JAR_FILE|db_port|db_password|db_user)$"` == "" ]]; then unsupported_props+=(${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[$v]}) fi done if [ ${#unsupported_props[*]} -gt 0 ]; then echo This update script does not support the update of the following properties: ${unsupported_props[*]} exit 1; fi
#overidable default vars export JBOSS_DS_USER_NAME="$db_user" export JBOSS_DS_USER_PWD="$db_password" export JBOSS_DS_JNDI_NAME="dukesBankDS" export JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION="jboss-5.1.0.GA" export JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME="default" export JBOSS_DS_DRIVER_CLASS="com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"
echo "Stopping jboss service" service jboss stop sleep 60
echo "Reconfiguring datasource with changed db_user and db_password property" . $jboss_deploy_datasource_script 2>&1 > /tmp/jboss_change_datasource.log echo "Finished script $jboss_deploy_datasource_script "
EAR_ORIG=`cd /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/deploy; ls` JAR_ORIG=`cd /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/lib; ls`
if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'EAR_FILE'` != "" ]]; then echo "Removing original DukesBank ear file" rm -rf $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/deploy/${EAR_ORIG} if [ -e $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/deploy/${EAR_ORIG} ]; then echo "File: $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/deploy/${EAR_ORIG} cannot be deleted" exit 1 else echo "Removed original DukesBank ear file: $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/deploy/${EAR_ORIG}" fi fi
if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'JAR_FILE'` != "" ]]; then echo "Removing original DukesBank jar file" rm -rf $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/lib/${JAR_ORIG} if [ -e $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/lib/${JAR_ORIG} ]; then echo "File: $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/lib/${JAR_ORIG} cannot be deleted" exit 1 else echo "Removed original DukesBank jar file: $HOME_DIR/$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION/jboss-as/server/$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME/lib/${JAR_ORIG}" fi fi
if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'EAR_FILE'` != "" ]]; then echo "Reinstalling DukesBank ear file from configuration-change location" JBOSS_COMPONENT_FILE=$EAR_FILE . $jboss_deploy_component_script &> /tmp/jboss_deploy_ear.log fi if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'JAR_FILE'` != "" ]]; then echo "Reinstalling DukesBank jar file from configuration-change location" JBOSS_COMPONENT_FILE=$JAR_FILE . $jboss_deploy_component_script &> /tmp/jboss_deploy_jar.log fi
if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'EAR_FILE'` != "" ]]; then echo "back up the new jboss ear component file" BASE_EAR_FILE=`basename ${EAR_FILE}` rm -rf /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/deploy/${EAR_ORIG} touch /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/deploy/${BASE_EAR_FILE} fi if [[ `echo "${APPD_UPDATE_PROPS[*]}" | grep 'JAR_FILE'` != "" ]]; then echo "back up the new jboss jar component file" BASE_JAR_FILE=`basename ${JAR_FILE}` rm -rf /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/lib/${JAR_ORIG} touch /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/lib/${BASE_JAR_FILE} fi
echo "Restarting jboss service" service jboss start
echo "Finished DukesBankApp:UPDATE"

ns8:component-version-script.description: Start jBoss server
ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash PATH=$PATH:/sbin:/usr/sbin export JBOSS_DS_CONNECTION_URL="jdbc:mysql://$db_host:$db_port/dukes_db"
service jboss stop
#overidable default vars if [ -z "$JBOSS_DS_USER_NAME" ]; then export JBOSS_DS_USER_NAME="$db_user" fi
if [ -z "$JBOSS_DS_USER_PWD" ]; then export JBOSS_DS_USER_PWD="$db_password" fi
if [ -z "$JBOSS_DS_JNDI_NAME" ]; then export JBOSS_DS_JNDI_NAME="dukesBankDS" fi
if [ -z "$JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION" ]; then export JBOSS_NAME_AND_VERSION="jboss-5.1.0.GA" fi
if [ -z "$JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME" ]; then export JBOSS_INSTANCE_NAME="default" fi
if [ -z "$JBOSS_DS_DRIVER_CLASS" ]; then export JBOSS_DS_DRIVER_CLASS="com.mysql.jdbc.Driver" fi
. $jboss_deploy_datasource_script &> /tmp/jboss_deploy_ds.log export JBOSS_COMPONENT_FILE=$EAR_FILE echo "reinstall ${JBOSS_COMPONENT_FILE} file" . $jboss_deploy_component_script &> /tmp/jboss_deploy_ear.log export JBOSS_COMPONENT_FILE=$JAR_FILE echo "reinstall ${JBOSS_COMPONENT_FILE} file" . $jboss_deploy_component_script &> /tmp/jboss_deploy_jar.log
echo "back up the jboss component files" mkdir -p /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/deploy mkdir -p /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/lib BASE_EAR_FILE=`basename ${EAR_FILE}` BASE_JAR_FILE=`basename ${JAR_FILE}` touch /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/deploy/${BASE_EAR_FILE} touch /tmp/jboss/dukesbank/lib/${BASE_JAR_FILE}
service jboss start

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/sh -p
#set -x
#parameters: #adc_ip_address management IP address of the ADC #adc_snmp_read SNMP read community public secured #adc_snmp_write SNMP write community private secured #adc_cli_user CLI user name admin secured #adc_cli_password CLI password admin secured #vdirect_va_address_2 IP address from 2nd ethernet card to be used as VIP #vip_port TCP port to be used for incoming traffic 80 #real_port TCP port connected at the back end servers 80 #application possible values: none,http,https,ssl,dns,rtsp,wts,basic-slb http #protocol possible values: none,tcp,udp,stateless none #session_persistence possible values: none,yes none #metric possible values: leastconns,svcleast,roundrobin,minmisses,hash,response,bandwidth,phash roundrobin #health_monitor possible values: arp,icmp,tcp,dns,udpdns,http,httphead,pop3,smtp,ftp,imap,sslh,sslhv3 tcp #health_monitor_content possible values: none, URI none #server_ips ip addresses of the back end servers
#constants: #container_name #adc_name #configure_service_template #add_servers_to_service_template
# Import Global conf #. $global_conf
set -x
container_name="adcc" adc_name="adc" configure_service_template="l4.vm" add_servers_to_service_template="add-rips-to-vis.vm"
#calculated: #vip_address - this is calculated
echo "local params:" echo "container_name $container_name" echo "adc_name $adc_name" echo "configure_service_template $configure_service_template" echo "add_servers_to_service_template $add_servers_to_service_template"
function validate_env_params(){ local params=("$@") local has_errors=0 for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#params[@]} ; i++ )); do local pname=${params[$i]} local pval=${!pname} if [ -z $pval ] then echo "ERROR: $pname is empty!" has_errors=1 # else # echo "$pname is defined" # echo "$pname=$pval" fi done if [ $has_errors -eq 1 ] then exit 1 fi }
function create_temp_file(){ local TMPFILE=`mktemp /tmp/$1.XXXXXXXXXX` if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "ERROR: failed to create temporary $1 file!!" exit 1 fi #echo "created $TMPFILE file" echo $TMPFILE }
function wait_for_vdirect_ws(){ echo "waiting for web services to start" /usr/bin/wget -t 30 --retry-connrefused -O /dev/null http://127.0.0.1:2188/management-server/services if [ $? -eq 0 ] then echo "hopefully web service have started" else echo "ERROR: web service is not started!!" exit 1 fi }
function check_if_container_name_exists(){ local container_name=$1
local TMPCONTLISTINP=$(create_temp_file "cont_list.inp") local TMPCONTLISTOUT=$(create_temp_file "cont_list.out")
echo "checking if $container_name already exists" echo /container/list > $TMPCONTLISTINP echo exit >> $TMPCONTLISTINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPCONTLISTINP > $TMPCONTLISTOUT
if grep $container_name $TMPCONTLISTOUT then echo "ERROR: container $container_name exists!!" #rm -f $TMPCONTLISTINP #rm -f $TMPCONTLISTOUT exit 1 fi
#rm -f $TMPCONTLISTINP #rm -f $TMPCONTLISTOUT }
function register_container(){ local container_name=$1 local adc_name=$2 local adc_ip_address=$3 local adc_snmp_read=$4 local adc_snmp_write=$5 local adc_cli_user=$6 local adc_cli_password=$7
local TMPCONTREGINP=$(create_temp_file "cont_reg.inp") local TMPCONTREGOUT=$(create_temp_file "cont_reg.out")
echo "trying to register $container_name" sleep 1
echo /container/register/dedicated $container_name > $TMPCONTREGINP echo ip $adc_ip_address >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo read $adc_snmp_read >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo write $adc_snmp_write >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo cliuser $adc_cli_user >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo clipassword $adc_cli_password >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo submit >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo connect $container_name >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo register >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo $adc_name >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo exit >> $TMPCONTREGINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPCONTREGINP > $TMPCONTREGOUT
if grep FAILED $TMPCONTREGOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to register container $container_name!! retrying" sleep 1 /opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPCONTREGINP > $TMPCONTREGOUT if grep FAILED $TMPCONTREGOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to register container $container_name for the 2nd time!!" #rm -f $TMPCONTREGINP #rm -f $TMPCONTREGOUT exit 1 fi fi
#rm -f $TMPCONTREGINP #rm -f $TMPCONTREGOUT
echo "sucessfuly registered $container_name" }
# this function will setup a global variable called vip_address function disable_2nd_ethernet(){ local vdirect_va_address_2=$1
echo "disabling the ethernet card allocated with the vip address $vdirect_va_address_2 as long as it is not eth0" local tmp_card_name=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep -B 1 "addr:$vdirect_va_address_2 " | /bin/grep -o eth[0-9]*` if [ -n "$tmp_card_name" ] then local mask_expression=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep "addr:$vdirect_va_address_2 " | /bin/grep -o Bcast:.*Mask` local card_ammount=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep -c "$mask_expression"` if [ $tmp_card_name == "eth0" ] then if [ $card_ammount -lt 2 ] then echo "ERROR: vip is mapped to eth0, than should be at least two cards on the same network!!" exit 1 fi echo "The IP is mapped to eth0 looking for another card" local tmp_card_name2=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep -B 1 "$mask_expression" | /bin/grep -o eth[0-9] | /bin/grep -v $tmp_card_name | /usr/bin/tail -1` echo "The possible other card is $tmp_card_name2" if [ -n "$tmp_card_name2" ] then local card_name=$tmp_card_name2 vip_address=`/sbin/ifconfig $card_name | /bin/grep 'inet addr:' | /bin/cut -d: -f2 | /bin/awk '{ print $1}'` if [ -z "$vip_address" ] then echo "ERROR: could not find the ip adress of $tmp_card_name2!!!" exit 1 fi else echo "ERROR: could not find a 2nd card which is not eth0!!!" exit 1 fi else local card_name=$tmp_card_name vip_address=$vdirect_va_address_2 fi
echo "disabling card $card_name and $vip_address originaly intended for card $tmp_card_name and $vdirect_va_address_2" /sbin/ifdown $card_name /bin/cp -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name.vdir.bak /bin/sed "s/ONBOOT=yes/ONBOOT=no/" /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name > /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name.vdir.new /bin/cp -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name.vdir.new /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name else echo "The vdirect_va_address_2 $vdirect_va_address_2 is not mapped to any exsiting network card, using as vip address" vip_address=$vdirect_va_address_2 fi ##vip_address should be set and used by the rest of the script }
function check_if_template_exists() { local adc_configuration_template_name=$1
local TMPTEMPLISTINP=$(create_temp_file "templ_list.inp") local TMPTEMPLISTOUT=$(create_temp_file "templ_list.out")
echo "checking if $adc_configuration_template_name exists"
echo /template/list > $TMPTEMPLISTINP echo exit >> $TMPTEMPLISTINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPTEMPLISTINP > $TMPTEMPLISTOUT
if ! grep $adc_configuration_template_name $TMPTEMPLISTOUT then echo "ERROR: container $adc_configuration_template_name does not exists!!" rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTINP rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTOUT exit 1 fi rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTINP rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTOUT }
function run_template() { local adc_name=$1 local adc_configuration_template_name=$2
local TMPADCCONFINP=$(create_temp_file "adc_conf.inp") local TMPADCCONFOUT=$(create_temp_file "adc_conf.out")
echo "trying to run on adc $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name" sleep 1
echo /template/connect $adc_name > $TMPADCCONFINP echo run $adc_configuration_template_name >> $TMPADCCONFINP for (( i = 3 ; i <= $# ; i++ )); do echo ${!i} >> $TMPADCCONFINP done echo apply >> $TMPADCCONFINP echo save >> $TMPADCCONFINP echo exit >> $TMPADCCONFINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPADCCONFINP > $TMPADCCONFOUT if grep FAILED $TMPADCCONFOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to run on $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name with parameters $@!! trying again." sleep 1 /opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPADCCONFINP > $TMPADCCONFOUT if grep FAILED $TMPADCCONFOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to 2nd try to run on $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name with parameters $@!!" rm -f $TMPADCCONFINP rm -f $TMPADCCONFOUT exit 1 fi fi
rm -f $TMPADCCONFINP rm -f $TMPADCCONFOUT
echo "sucessfuly run on adc $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name" }
#star the actual script
declare -a env_params=(adc_ip_address adc_snmp_read adc_snmp_write adc_cli_user adc_cli_password vdirect_va_address_2 vip_port real_port application protocol session_persistence metric health_monitor health_monitor_content server_ips) echo "expected parameters=${env_params[@]}" validate_env_params "${env_params[@]}"
wait_for_vdirect_ws
check_if_container_name_exists $container_name register_container $container_name $adc_name $adc_ip_address $adc_snmp_read $adc_snmp_write $adc_cli_user $adc_cli_password
disable_2nd_ethernet $vdirect_va_address_2
check_if_template_exists $configure_service_template run_template $adc_name $configure_service_template $vdirect_va_address_2 $vip_address $vip_port $real_port $application $protocol $session_persistence $metric $health_monitor $health_monitor_content
check_if_template_exists $add_servers_to_service_template
#the followin lines will either accept an array or a space delimited string and will transform it to a comma delimited string srv_string="${server_ips[*]}" srv_space=" " srv_comma="," SRVSTR=${srv_string//$srv_space/$srv_comma}
run_template $adc_name $add_servers_to_service_template $vdirect_va_address_2 $SRVSTR
exit 0

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/sh -p
#set -x
#parameters: #adc_ip_address management IP address of the ADC #adc_snmp_read SNMP read community public secured #adc_snmp_write SNMP write community private secured #adc_cli_user CLI user name admin secured #adc_cli_password CLI password admin secured #vdirect_va_address_2 IP address from 2nd ethernet card to be used as VIP #vip_port TCP port to be used for incoming traffic 80 #real_port TCP port connected at the back end servers 80 #application possible values: none,http,https,ssl,dns,rtsp,wts,basic-slb http #protocol possible values: none,tcp,udp,stateless none #session_persistence possible values: none,yes none #metric possible values: leastconns,svcleast,roundrobin,minmisses,hash,response,bandwidth,phash roundrobin #health_monitor possible values: arp,icmp,tcp,dns,udpdns,http,httphead,pop3,smtp,ftp,imap,sslh,sslhv3 tcp #health_monitor_content possible values: none, URI none #server_ips ip addresses of the back end servers
#constants: #container_name #adc_name #configure_service_template #add_servers_to_service_template
# Import Global conf #. $global_conf
set -x
container_name="adcc" adc_name="adc" configure_service_template="l4.vm" add_servers_to_service_template="add-rips-to-vis.vm"
#calculated: #vip_address - this is calculated
echo "local params:" echo "container_name $container_name" echo "adc_name $adc_name" echo "configure_service_template $configure_service_template" echo "add_servers_to_service_template $add_servers_to_service_template"
function validate_env_params(){ local params=("$@") local has_errors=0 for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#params[@]} ; i++ )); do local pname=${params[$i]} local pval=${!pname} if [ -z $pval ] then echo "ERROR: $pname is empty!" has_errors=1 # else # echo "$pname is defined" # echo "$pname=$pval" fi done if [ $has_errors -eq 1 ] then exit 1 fi }
function create_temp_file(){ local TMPFILE=`mktemp /tmp/$1.XXXXXXXXXX` if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "ERROR: failed to create temporary $1 file!!" exit 1 fi #echo "created $TMPFILE file" echo $TMPFILE }
function wait_for_vdirect_ws(){ echo "waiting for web services to start" /usr/bin/wget -t 30 --retry-connrefused -O /dev/null http://127.0.0.1:2188/management-server/services if [ $? -eq 0 ] then echo "hopefully web service have started" else echo "ERROR: web service is not started!!" exit 1 fi }
function check_if_container_name_exists(){ local container_name=$1
local TMPCONTLISTINP=$(create_temp_file "cont_list.inp") local TMPCONTLISTOUT=$(create_temp_file "cont_list.out")
echo "checking if $container_name already exists" echo /container/list > $TMPCONTLISTINP echo exit >> $TMPCONTLISTINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPCONTLISTINP > $TMPCONTLISTOUT
if grep $container_name $TMPCONTLISTOUT then echo "ERROR: container $container_name exists!!" #rm -f $TMPCONTLISTINP #rm -f $TMPCONTLISTOUT exit 1 fi
#rm -f $TMPCONTLISTINP #rm -f $TMPCONTLISTOUT }
function register_container(){ local container_name=$1 local adc_name=$2 local adc_ip_address=$3 local adc_snmp_read=$4 local adc_snmp_write=$5 local adc_cli_user=$6 local adc_cli_password=$7
local TMPCONTREGINP=$(create_temp_file "cont_reg.inp") local TMPCONTREGOUT=$(create_temp_file "cont_reg.out")
echo "trying to register $container_name" sleep 1
echo /container/register/dedicated $container_name > $TMPCONTREGINP echo ip $adc_ip_address >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo read $adc_snmp_read >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo write $adc_snmp_write >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo cliuser $adc_cli_user >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo clipassword $adc_cli_password >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo submit >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo connect $container_name >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo register >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo $adc_name >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo exit >> $TMPCONTREGINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPCONTREGINP > $TMPCONTREGOUT
if grep FAILED $TMPCONTREGOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to register container $container_name!! retrying" sleep 1 /opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPCONTREGINP > $TMPCONTREGOUT if grep FAILED $TMPCONTREGOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to register container $container_name for the 2nd time!!" #rm -f $TMPCONTREGINP #rm -f $TMPCONTREGOUT exit 1 fi fi
#rm -f $TMPCONTREGINP #rm -f $TMPCONTREGOUT
echo "sucessfuly registered $container_name" }
# this function will setup a global variable called vip_address function disable_2nd_ethernet(){ local vdirect_va_address_2=$1
echo "disabling the ethernet card allocated with the vip address $vdirect_va_address_2 as long as it is not eth0" local tmp_card_name=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep -B 1 "addr:$vdirect_va_address_2 " | /bin/grep -o eth[0-9]*` if [ -n "$tmp_card_name" ] then local mask_expression=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep "addr:$vdirect_va_address_2 " | /bin/grep -o Bcast:.*Mask` local card_ammount=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep -c "$mask_expression"` if [ $tmp_card_name == "eth0" ] then if [ $card_ammount -lt 2 ] then echo "ERROR: vip is mapped to eth0, than should be at least two cards on the same network!!" exit 1 fi echo "The IP is mapped to eth0 looking for another card" local tmp_card_name2=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep -B 1 "$mask_expression" | /bin/grep -o eth[0-9] | /bin/grep -v $tmp_card_name | /usr/bin/tail -1` echo "The possible other card is $tmp_card_name2" if [ -n "$tmp_card_name2" ] then local card_name=$tmp_card_name2 vip_address=`/sbin/ifconfig $card_name | /bin/grep 'inet addr:' | /bin/cut -d: -f2 | /bin/awk '{ print $1}'` if [ -z "$vip_address" ] then echo "ERROR: could not find the ip adress of $tmp_card_name2!!!" exit 1 fi else echo "ERROR: could not find a 2nd card which is not eth0!!!" exit 1 fi else local card_name=$tmp_card_name vip_address=$vdirect_va_address_2 fi
echo "disabling card $card_name and $vip_address originaly intended for card $tmp_card_name and $vdirect_va_address_2" /sbin/ifdown $card_name /bin/cp -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name.vdir.bak /bin/sed "s/ONBOOT=yes/ONBOOT=no/" /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name > /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name.vdir.new /bin/cp -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name.vdir.new /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name else echo "The vdirect_va_address_2 $vdirect_va_address_2 is not mapped to any exsiting network card, using as vip address" vip_address=$vdirect_va_address_2 fi ##vip_address should be set and used by the rest of the script }
function check_if_template_exists() { local adc_configuration_template_name=$1
local TMPTEMPLISTINP=$(create_temp_file "templ_list.inp") local TMPTEMPLISTOUT=$(create_temp_file "templ_list.out")
echo "checking if $adc_configuration_template_name exists"
echo /template/list > $TMPTEMPLISTINP echo exit >> $TMPTEMPLISTINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPTEMPLISTINP > $TMPTEMPLISTOUT
if ! grep $adc_configuration_template_name $TMPTEMPLISTOUT then echo "ERROR: container $adc_configuration_template_name does not exists!!" rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTINP rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTOUT exit 1 fi rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTINP rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTOUT }
function run_template() { local adc_name=$1 local adc_configuration_template_name=$2
local TMPADCCONFINP=$(create_temp_file "adc_conf.inp") local TMPADCCONFOUT=$(create_temp_file "adc_conf.out")
echo "trying to run on adc $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name" sleep 1
echo /template/connect $adc_name > $TMPADCCONFINP echo run $adc_configuration_template_name >> $TMPADCCONFINP for (( i = 3 ; i <= $# ; i++ )); do echo ${!i} >> $TMPADCCONFINP done echo apply >> $TMPADCCONFINP echo save >> $TMPADCCONFINP echo exit >> $TMPADCCONFINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPADCCONFINP > $TMPADCCONFOUT if grep FAILED $TMPADCCONFOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to run on $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name with parameters $@!! trying again." sleep 1 /opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPADCCONFINP > $TMPADCCONFOUT if grep FAILED $TMPADCCONFOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to 2nd try to run on $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name with parameters $@!!" rm -f $TMPADCCONFINP rm -f $TMPADCCONFOUT exit 1 fi fi
rm -f $TMPADCCONFINP rm -f $TMPADCCONFOUT
echo "sucessfuly run on adc $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name" }
#star the actual script
declare -a env_params=(adc_ip_address adc_snmp_read adc_snmp_write adc_cli_user adc_cli_password vdirect_va_address_2 vip_port real_port application protocol session_persistence metric health_monitor health_monitor_content server_ips) echo "expected parameters=${env_params[@]}" validate_env_params "${env_params[@]}"
wait_for_vdirect_ws
check_if_container_name_exists $container_name register_container $container_name $adc_name $adc_ip_address $adc_snmp_read $adc_snmp_write $adc_cli_user $adc_cli_password
disable_2nd_ethernet $vdirect_va_address_2
check_if_template_exists $configure_service_template run_template $adc_name $configure_service_template $vdirect_va_address_2 $vip_address $vip_port $real_port $application $protocol $session_persistence $metric $health_monitor $health_monitor_content
check_if_template_exists $add_servers_to_service_template
#the followin lines will either accept an array or a space delimited string and will transform it to a comma delimited string srv_string="${server_ips[*]}" srv_space=" " srv_comma="," SRVSTR=${srv_string//$srv_space/$srv_comma}
run_template $adc_name $add_servers_to_service_template $vdirect_va_address_2 $SRVSTR
exit 0

ns8:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/sh -p
#set -x
#parameters: #adc_ip_address management IP address of the ADC #adc_snmp_read SNMP read community public secured #adc_snmp_write SNMP write community private secured #adc_cli_user CLI user name admin secured #adc_cli_password CLI password admin secured #vdirect_va_address_2 IP address from 2nd ethernet card to be used as VIP #vip_port TCP port to be used for incoming traffic 80 #real_port TCP port connected at the back end servers 80 #application possible values: none,http,https,ssl,dns,rtsp,wts,basic-slb http #protocol possible values: none,tcp,udp,stateless none #session_persistence possible values: none,yes none #metric possible values: leastconns,svcleast,roundrobin,minmisses,hash,response,bandwidth,phash roundrobin #health_monitor possible values: arp,icmp,tcp,dns,udpdns,http,httphead,pop3,smtp,ftp,imap,sslh,sslhv3 tcp #health_monitor_content possible values: none, URI none #server_ips ip addresses of the back end servers
#constants: #container_name #adc_name #configure_service_template #add_servers_to_service_template
# Import Global conf #. $global_conf
set -x
container_name="adcc" adc_name="adc" configure_service_template="l4.vm" add_servers_to_service_template="add-rips-to-vis.vm"
#calculated: #vip_address - this is calculated
echo "local params:" echo "container_name $container_name" echo "adc_name $adc_name" echo "configure_service_template $configure_service_template" echo "add_servers_to_service_template $add_servers_to_service_template"
function validate_env_params(){ local params=("$@") local has_errors=0 for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#params[@]} ; i++ )); do local pname=${params[$i]} local pval=${!pname} if [ -z $pval ] then echo "ERROR: $pname is empty!" has_errors=1 # else # echo "$pname is defined" # echo "$pname=$pval" fi done if [ $has_errors -eq 1 ] then exit 1 fi }
function create_temp_file(){ local TMPFILE=`mktemp /tmp/$1.XXXXXXXXXX` if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo "ERROR: failed to create temporary $1 file!!" exit 1 fi #echo "created $TMPFILE file" echo $TMPFILE }
function wait_for_vdirect_ws(){ echo "waiting for web services to start" /usr/bin/wget -t 30 --retry-connrefused -O /dev/null http://127.0.0.1:2188/management-server/services if [ $? -eq 0 ] then echo "hopefully web service have started" else echo "ERROR: web service is not started!!" exit 1 fi }
function check_if_container_name_exists(){ local container_name=$1
local TMPCONTLISTINP=$(create_temp_file "cont_list.inp") local TMPCONTLISTOUT=$(create_temp_file "cont_list.out")
echo "checking if $container_name already exists" echo /container/list > $TMPCONTLISTINP echo exit >> $TMPCONTLISTINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPCONTLISTINP > $TMPCONTLISTOUT
if grep $container_name $TMPCONTLISTOUT then echo "ERROR: container $container_name exists!!" #rm -f $TMPCONTLISTINP #rm -f $TMPCONTLISTOUT exit 1 fi
#rm -f $TMPCONTLISTINP #rm -f $TMPCONTLISTOUT }
function register_container(){ local container_name=$1 local adc_name=$2 local adc_ip_address=$3 local adc_snmp_read=$4 local adc_snmp_write=$5 local adc_cli_user=$6 local adc_cli_password=$7
local TMPCONTREGINP=$(create_temp_file "cont_reg.inp") local TMPCONTREGOUT=$(create_temp_file "cont_reg.out")
echo "trying to register $container_name" sleep 1
echo /container/register/dedicated $container_name > $TMPCONTREGINP echo ip $adc_ip_address >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo read $adc_snmp_read >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo write $adc_snmp_write >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo cliuser $adc_cli_user >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo clipassword $adc_cli_password >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo submit >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo connect $container_name >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo register >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo $adc_name >> $TMPCONTREGINP echo exit >> $TMPCONTREGINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPCONTREGINP > $TMPCONTREGOUT
if grep FAILED $TMPCONTREGOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to register container $container_name!! retrying" sleep 1 /opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPCONTREGINP > $TMPCONTREGOUT if grep FAILED $TMPCONTREGOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to register container $container_name for the 2nd time!!" #rm -f $TMPCONTREGINP #rm -f $TMPCONTREGOUT exit 1 fi fi
#rm -f $TMPCONTREGINP #rm -f $TMPCONTREGOUT
echo "sucessfuly registered $container_name" }
# this function will setup a global variable called vip_address function disable_2nd_ethernet(){ local vdirect_va_address_2=$1
echo "disabling the ethernet card allocated with the vip address $vdirect_va_address_2 as long as it is not eth0" local tmp_card_name=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep -B 1 "addr:$vdirect_va_address_2 " | /bin/grep -o eth[0-9]*` if [ -n "$tmp_card_name" ] then local mask_expression=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep "addr:$vdirect_va_address_2 " | /bin/grep -o Bcast:.*Mask` local card_ammount=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep -c "$mask_expression"` if [ $tmp_card_name == "eth0" ] then if [ $card_ammount -lt 2 ] then echo "ERROR: vip is mapped to eth0, than should be at least two cards on the same network!!" exit 1 fi echo "The IP is mapped to eth0 looking for another card" local tmp_card_name2=`/sbin/ifconfig -a | /bin/grep -B 1 "$mask_expression" | /bin/grep -o eth[0-9] | /bin/grep -v $tmp_card_name | /usr/bin/tail -1` echo "The possible other card is $tmp_card_name2" if [ -n "$tmp_card_name2" ] then local card_name=$tmp_card_name2 vip_address=`/sbin/ifconfig $card_name | /bin/grep 'inet addr:' | /bin/cut -d: -f2 | /bin/awk '{ print $1}'` if [ -z "$vip_address" ] then echo "ERROR: could not find the ip adress of $tmp_card_name2!!!" exit 1 fi else echo "ERROR: could not find a 2nd card which is not eth0!!!" exit 1 fi else local card_name=$tmp_card_name vip_address=$vdirect_va_address_2 fi
echo "disabling card $card_name and $vip_address originaly intended for card $tmp_card_name and $vdirect_va_address_2" /sbin/ifdown $card_name /bin/cp -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name.vdir.bak /bin/sed "s/ONBOOT=yes/ONBOOT=no/" /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name > /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name.vdir.new /bin/cp -f /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name.vdir.new /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-$card_name else echo "The vdirect_va_address_2 $vdirect_va_address_2 is not mapped to any exsiting network card, using as vip address" vip_address=$vdirect_va_address_2 fi ##vip_address should be set and used by the rest of the script }
function check_if_template_exists() { local adc_configuration_template_name=$1
local TMPTEMPLISTINP=$(create_temp_file "templ_list.inp") local TMPTEMPLISTOUT=$(create_temp_file "templ_list.out")
echo "checking if $adc_configuration_template_name exists"
echo /template/list > $TMPTEMPLISTINP echo exit >> $TMPTEMPLISTINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPTEMPLISTINP > $TMPTEMPLISTOUT
if ! grep $adc_configuration_template_name $TMPTEMPLISTOUT then echo "ERROR: container $adc_configuration_template_name does not exists!!" rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTINP rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTOUT exit 1 fi rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTINP rm -f $TMPTEMPLISTOUT }
function run_template() { local adc_name=$1 local adc_configuration_template_name=$2
local TMPADCCONFINP=$(create_temp_file "adc_conf.inp") local TMPADCCONFOUT=$(create_temp_file "adc_conf.out")
echo "trying to run on adc $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name" sleep 1
echo /template/connect $adc_name > $TMPADCCONFINP echo run $adc_configuration_template_name >> $TMPADCCONFINP for (( i = 3 ; i <= $# ; i++ )); do echo ${!i} >> $TMPADCCONFINP done echo apply >> $TMPADCCONFINP echo save >> $TMPADCCONFINP echo exit >> $TMPADCCONFINP
/opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPADCCONFINP > $TMPADCCONFOUT if grep FAILED $TMPADCCONFOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to run on $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name with parameters $@!! trying again." sleep 1 /opt/cli/vdirectcli.sh < $TMPADCCONFINP > $TMPADCCONFOUT if grep FAILED $TMPADCCONFOUT then echo "ERROR: failed to 2nd try to run on $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name with parameters $@!!" rm -f $TMPADCCONFINP rm -f $TMPADCCONFOUT exit 1 fi fi
rm -f $TMPADCCONFINP rm -f $TMPADCCONFOUT
echo "sucessfuly run on adc $adc_name template $adc_configuration_template_name" }
#star the actual script
declare -a env_params=(adc_ip_address adc_snmp_read adc_snmp_write adc_cli_user adc_cli_password vdirect_va_address_2 vip_port real_port application protocol session_persistence metric health_monitor health_monitor_content server_ips) echo "expected parameters=${env_params[@]}" validate_env_params "${env_params[@]}"
wait_for_vdirect_ws
check_if_container_name_exists $container_name register_container $container_name $adc_name $adc_ip_address $adc_snmp_read $adc_snmp_write $adc_cli_user $adc_cli_password
disable_2nd_ethernet $vdirect_va_address_2
check_if_template_exists $configure_service_template run_template $adc_name $configure_service_template $vdirect_va_address_2 $vip_address $vip_port $real_port $application $protocol $session_persistence $metric $health_monitor $health_monitor_content
check_if_template_exists $add_servers_to_service_template
#the followin lines will either accept an array or a space delimited string and will transform it to a comma delimited string srv_string="${server_ips[*]}" srv_space=" " srv_comma="," SRVSTR=${srv_string//$srv_space/$srv_comma}
run_template $adc_name $add_servers_to_service_template $vdirect_va_address_2 $SRVSTR
exit 0
